Yes, some of the private transport companies in Meghalaya also offer guided tours of the state's natural attractions. Here are some services that offer both transport and tours:

1. ChaloHoppo - This travel company provides private transportation and guided tours in Meghalaya. They offer curated trips that cover a range of activities, including trekking, camping, and cultural experiences. 2. Comfort Tour and Travels - This private transport company offers a range of tours, including day tours that cover popular attractions like Mawphlang Sacred Grove and Laitlum Canyons. 3. Authentic Trails - This company provides private transportation and customized tours of Meghalaya's natural attractions. They offer trekking and camping trips, village homestays, and cultural experiences. 4. Meghalaya Tourism Helpline - This is the official helpline of the Meghalaya Tourism Department, which provides information and assistance to visitors. They offer pre-packaged tours that cover popular tourist destinations, including transportation and accommodation. It is recommended to check with the company to see if they offer specific tours that interest you or if you can customize a tour according to your preference.
